lender.name: Seeds of Change
lender.loan_because: We know the power of the organized and we are dedicated to fostering development from the ground up. With so little we can do so much...which is why we continue
lender.occupational_info: We are a high school micro credit society with 7 students students and 3 teachers working to raise as much funds and striving to help as many people as possible.

lender.name: Mohd Khawaja
lender.loan_because: I'm here to empower micro entrepreneurs and help them achieve macro dreams!

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: it makes the world go around!

lender.name: Kristina
lender.loan_because: i can. and you can too.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.occupational_info: research (developmental psychology)

lender.name: Katy
lender.loan_because: I enjoy the chance to see these small business ventures around the world.

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because:
Both my husband and I have been believers in giving back to our community and have actively participated over the years in so many rewarding activities.
We have encouraged this in our children too, and we hope to leave this world in a better place than we found it.
I am thankful to Denise for making me aware of this AMAZING opportunity to extend my reach and to feel a part in Rowena's efforts to improve her family's life. As a fellow woman entrepreneur, I can relate to the many challenges that we face not only in providing for our families, but in our role as mothers.
lender.occupational_info:
I am a Social Media Specialist Virtual Assistant and owner of Virtually Yours, Joanne Burgess. My goal is to act as a strong business partner to my clients, providing services that allow them to focus more of their attention on growing their business to the next level.
Learn more about the other services I offer, read my blog, find out more about me on LinkedIn, connect with me on Facebook, or follow me on Twitter.
My website is the starting point. You'll find all the links you need there! .

lender.name: Ian Lumb
lender.loan_because: I want to experience Kiva in action

lender.name: Rachel
lender.occupational_info: I help people stay healthy and continue to do the things they love to do with Therapeutic Massage

lender.occupation: Retired healthcare professional and bon vivant.
lender.loan_because: Lara (my daughter) has been raving about the site since she discovered it!

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: Store up your treasures in heaven.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher

lender.name: Grant
lender.loan_because: I want to help people succeed to their potential; help bring people out of poverty
lender.occupational_info: I am active in the non-profit and social enterprise sector

lender.name: Dean Hin
lender.loan_because: It is good the world could use.

lender.occupational_info: Rutgers Church is a member of the More Light Churches Network, an organization of inclusive Presbyterian churches that welcome individuals into full membership,including ordained offices, without regard to sexual orientation or gender identity.

lender.occupation: Director, Trace Me Luggage Tracker Ltd
lender.loan_because: it does make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I work with a terrific company who believe passionately about protecting luggage from loss whilst travelling

lender.name: Jomicheal
lender.loan_because: I can learn to blow glass. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9e0yu2dUbh8&feature=related

lender.name: Mark & Theresa
lender.loan_because: because God has given us such tremendous love and grace; because we just happened to be born in the wealthiest, safest society on earth; and because organizations like Kiva are one of the innumerable means through which God is redeeming this world!
lender.occupational_info: Mark is an entrepreneur and consultant. Theresa is an attorney practicing in the real estate area (transactions and litigation).

lender.name: family wieser n tesarik
lender.loan_because: it helps people build a better life. We are Verena, Andreas, Maximilian, Jacob, Phyllis, Georg, Melanie, Sophie and Alexander
lender.occupational_info: I contribute to saving peoples lives through research

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Lilly
lender.loan_because: I believe in the magic that lies within us all.
lender.occupational_info: As an entrepreneur I believe in the power of a dream, and know the satisfaction that comes from working for yourself. Keep up the great work and keep dreaming that your future will be bigger than your past.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed beyond belief and want to share those blessings with others who are inspiring the world through their Creative Spirit.
lender.occupational_info: Through writing books, speaking at conferences, and coaching online, I help people keep their creative spirit healthy, happy, and on purpose. The three principles that guide me are appreciation, inspiration, and enthusiasm. Who do you appreciate? Tell them. What are you grateful for? Tell yourself. Who and what inspires you? Tell the world.

lender.name: amy
lender.loan_because: kiva and maria shriver made it easy!
lender.occupational_info: i tell people's stories.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I feel it helps others in a way that is not too hard on my budget, but may mean the world to those I loan to.
lender.occupational_info: I set up the technical aspects of concerts and special events (anything from Lady GaGa to a Microsoft Trade Show, to Wrestling - WWE).

lender.name: Sundeep
lender.loan_because: of seeing how it might work. In loaning a small amount, I want to test if my money will come back to me. Also one good way of helping people instead of giving free money but I want to see it from my heart on the effects it might give.
lender.occupational_info: I have yet to make any work. I am a University Student wanting to become a Medical Doctor some day.

lender.name: jackie
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great idea and service to those who are trying to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I tell people a bout the good things that my organization does in order to improve its business and enhance its reputation.

lender.name: Dale
lender.occupational_info: Holding hands across nations and seas, we offer our support and our belief in each other

lender.name: Lora Lee
lender.loan_because: I feel that I have been blessed with abundance and want that feeling to be shared. And I like the community factor in Kiva, feeling that, acting together, we can accomplish more.
lender.occupational_info: I am a salesperson, and mainly sell over the phone to customers all over the United States. I sell the finest Omega supplements. In the past, I have sold incense, oils, candles, telephone headsets, tax services, eyeglasses, or boat charters.

lender.name: Tobias
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of this direct 1to1 support.
lender.occupational_info: Well, I work for a big aircraft manufacturer.

lender.name: Life Group
lender.loan_because: "Teacher, which is the greatest commandment in the Law?" Jesus replied: " 'Love the Lord your God with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your mind.' This is the first and greatest commandment. And the second is like it: 'Love your neighbor as yourself.'[

lender.name: Gillian
lender.loan_because: I feel that this is the way people can make progress in their community and therefor gain self respect as well as respect from others. I see this as an opportunity for other members of the community attaining the same acumen as the first borrower
lender.occupational_info: i supply medicines to people who have a written letter from a doctor to say they need them.

lender.name: Yvonne
lender.loan_because: This makes sense!

lender.occupation: Teacher and Thai Yoga Massage Practitioner

lender.name: Lesley
lender.loan_because: I like to see people get ahead by their own efforts so I loan to encourage them.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I simply want to be a part of a solution to help others.

lender.name: Jacque
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of my extra cash contributing to the collective good.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a small department of a major financial services firm.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I want people outside the US to understand that Americans truly do care, and want success for all people.
lender.occupational_info: I teach others how to take care of Customers, and how to help others with computer problems.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Why not put forth some idle cash to support capital formation?

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: it's so meaningful to be able to help on a direct, person-to-person basis.
lender.occupational_info: I run ElegantRoots.com, an internet store that sells traditional arts from around the world that support the traditional lifestyles of the artisans.

lender.name: rebecca
lender.loan_because: i can.
lender.occupational_info: i teach part time at a university and i am an artist.

lender.name: BETTIE
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from a governmental State Social Service agency, where I licensed and monitored the care and supervision of clients, children, consumers, who were placed in out of home care.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: It's a small thing I can do to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: As a part time project I would like to build more support for farmers using System of Rice Intensification methods.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: I want to reach across the distance and barriers of geography, language and religion to touch someone's life somewhere, somehow in little ways that I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am primarily engaged in managing wealth for my clients. However I do recognise that many people are living in poverty and I want to help in little ways that I can.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: It seems like a good thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I build websites.

lender.name: Revmira
lender.loan_because: What happens to one of us happens to all of us. When I found myself pregnant, unemployed, and divorcing within a short span of time, someone loaned me $100 to buy supplies I needed to sell clothing and accessories on consignment until I finished school, so I could take care of my baby. I'll never forget that small but profound kindness.

lender.name: Simeon
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life and I believe this is a good way/

lender.name: Ron C.
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can.
lender.occupational_info: I run a small mountain lodge at 9600 feet elevation in the Yosemite High Country.

lender.name: Michaela
lender.loan_because: "To leave the world a bit better, whether by a healthy child, a garden patch or a redeemed social condition; to know even one life has breathed easier because you have lived. This is to have succeeded." - Emerson
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently a graduate student studying public health.

lender.name: Atta Zahedi
lender.occupational_info: High School Student

lender.name: BACOLETBOB
lender.occupational_info: Aerospace

lender.name: anthony
lender.loan_because: I believe in hope, and people who want to work hard.
lender.occupational_info: Work defines the emotion of my spirt. My work echos the world around me.

lender.name: Gabriella
lender.loan_because: One small loan at a time makes a world of difference to hard working individuals who need assistance to overcome poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am a professional volunteer, giving to my communities (local or worldwide) is my calling.

lender.name: Luke
lender.loan_because: It's the fair thing to do.

lender.name: Farzin
lender.loan_because: I'm addicted to helping other people who want to be helped.
lender.occupational_info: As of now I am fighting for minority rights in Iran.

lender.name: fetterless
lender.loan_because:
. an Entrepreneur, is like a seeded garden awaiting water.
Lending is like watering an Entrepreneur's business seed to allow it to germinate. Then with the Entrepreneur's tender care, the seedling grows until the harvest. The harvest benefits not only the Entrepreneur but ripples outward to bless the world.
Along the way, the loan water is recaptured and returned to the Lender's cup ready to lend again. What better reason to be a Kiva Lender? .
lender.occupational_info:
To really see another is to see the image and likeness of Love. This true, vibrant view corrects false picture of self and neighbor. Poverty and lack disappear and ever present harmony is revealed for all to see.
My work is to see the reality of grace in place of human need. To see through Love's eyes that, right now, all is "good, very good" .

lender.name: Freddie
lender.loan_because: I want to help people

lender.name: Madan
lender.loan_because: Simply, I believe in paying it forward. I am not "rich" in terms of western society, but rich enough to help few individuals overcome their financial hurdles. (Of course, Kiva is making it easier to help in this process)
lender.occupational_info: Working in the Enterprise Performance / Financial Mgmnt sector - Its both challenging, interesting and satisfying.

lender.name: Sarkis
lender.loan_because: Money is just green paper.
lender.occupational_info: I learn history and that we're all more connected than we think.

lender.name: Nina
lender.loan_because: I heard about Kiva on the BBC, and I knew instantly that I wanted to help out.

lender.name: selwyn
lender.loan_because: Hi.just want to help out
lender.occupational_info: catering to school camps around new zealand

lender.loan_because: Because i can help someone having a better life
lender.occupational_info: My work is to stay sharp to any problems with television, internet or voip to report imediatly to teams so can they resolve the incidents fast without problems to the client

lender.loan_because: It is a direct and personal way to help your fellow man.

lender.loan_because: Everyone should have a chance to be independent

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: I may not have a lot, but it doesn't mean I shouldn't help those with less.
lender.occupational_info: I am not working right now.

lender.loan_because: He who is kind to the poor lends to the LORD, and he will reward him for what he has done. Proverbs 19:17

lender.name: One Man and a Solution
lender.loan_because: I help wherever possible.
lender.occupational_info: I bring technology to the masses. Through education and recycling, we can make use of our old computers, and help bring more of the world into the communication age.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: I need a loan to help me purchase equipment to do more & bigger jobs.
lender.occupational_info: Commercial Cleaning Company that clean floors, restrooms, take out trash etc..... I go out to businesses, schools, churches, to solicit them for their business.

lender.name: Mary Jane
lender.loan_because: I'm very grateful for all that life has given me and Kiva is a wonderful opportunity to touch the lives of those in need, with a hand-up. I'm so honored to be in a position to help.

lender.name: Tamara
lender.occupational_info: I am a family photographer .I do onsite shoots and studio shoots as well.I find my job very rewarding and fun.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I currently drive a 1987 Toyota Camry station wagon which has multiple issues. In order to get to my clients, I need a better vehicle. I am not looking for a brand new vehicle, but my business require that I have a reliable vehicle. In addition, at times, I need to purchase storage bins for my clients.
lender.occupational_info: I organize residential, commercial, business and storage spaces. I bring order to many and unorganized spaces believing that clutter creates confusion and stress, but tidiness creates a sense of peacefulness.

lender.name: Ebony
lender.loan_because: I would like to open the first mobile male grooming lounge, so come get on my bus!!
lender.occupational_info: Grooming mens hands and feet has been a great experience. I perform the basic manicure and pedicure: nail shaping, cuticle clean-up, fingertip blend, high gloss buff, mint juleup masque, sugar polish w/ hot towel, or paraffin wax treatment plus a deep but gentle massage. Along with each service, I pride myself in educating each client on how to take care of themselves in between visits.

lender.name: steven
lender.loan_because: I need Money for my startup company which is getting busy
lender.occupational_info:
Welcome to North Georgia Virtual Services. We provide Business Outsourcing to individuals, small to midsize companies and large corporations that need a more efficient solution to save money. In these trying times Business still need to expand. Budget restraints make it impossible to hire new employees, or purchase equipment. Hiring a part time or ful l time Virtual Assistant is the answer.
Consider Outsourcing your administrative services to a administrative support team that will be on call 24/7 to take care of everyday tasks and will help you to boost your productivity.
Hiring a North Georgia virtual assistant or outsourcing your call center will help you eliminate administrative overhead and increase cash flow. You can focus on the things which you excel in and leave the rest to your expert virtual assistant team. You will reduce stress and take a big step toward fulfilling your business objectives.
North GA Virtual Services provides a staff of professionals who are highly skilled and trained. We can provide you Virtual Assistant 24-hrs 7-days a week. On a yearly basis, or a project by project basis. We provide hourly services, as well as a monthly retainer program.
If you have a need for call center outsourcing we can reduce your cost dramatically with the use of a virtual call center at North Georgia Virtual Services .

lender.name: Kareema
lender.loan_because: daycare equipment such as cribs, tables, chairs, toys, educational activity, computers, etc
lender.occupational_info: I provide childcare services to children ages 6 weeks to 12 while parents work or attend school.

lender.name: Rodney
lender.occupational_info: My name is Rodney Braswell I have been a carpenter for 14 years and now branching off and started my own business. I master in Full Bathroom remodeling, Kitchen remodeling, doors, windows, and all kinds of flooring and much more. I am Bonded and have many references to offer. . Hope I can assist you in the future.

lender.name: Sonya
lender.loan_because: I feel if each person did a little for another person, this world you be a greater place for each and everyone of us. We are all part of each other.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit agency that helps elders in my small corner of the world.

lender.name: cherry
lender.loan_because: IT MAY BE A TIME WHEN I NEED HELP
lender.occupational_info: CHERRY AND GARY BEEN OPERATING MIAMI FLORIDA JANITOR SERVICE SINCE 1999 PRESENTLY WE CAN'T SUBMIT ANY BIDS FOR ANY LARGE CONTRACTS DUE TO OUR VAN BEING COLLECTED, OUR SON ELIJAH HAS THREE CHRONIC ILLNESS .THAT NEEDES SUPERVISION 24 HOURS I PRAY FOR A BLESSING.

lender.name: Renee
lender.loan_because: none of us can get where we want until all of us get there! We all want to contribute to life and have a life we love that matters.
lender.occupational_info: I am a healing presence from a Quaker-Catholic background seeking to help God heal.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: Everyone at one time or another needs a little help
lender.occupational_info: Retired US Army

lender.name: Lee
lender.loan_because: I need a loan of $10,000 to start my company Burdettesnowboards.com & myspace.com/Burdettesnowboards
lender.occupational_info: Starting Entrepeneur that has already had an amazing response, even two pro skaters and a penthouse model have personally commented on myspace.com/Burdettesnowboards. I just need the money to buy the boards to get started. I'm also the most sponsored snowboarder in WV history, with 50 sponsors under contract! including Spy Optic, Dogtown Skateboards, Globe Shoes and many many more!!

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: I have previously been an entrepreneur and wish a progam like this had existed for me.

lender.name: Eugena
lender.loan_because:
I am a small restaurant owner in Gainesville Fl. I have been in business for 5 years. I am in need of a loan so that I can stay in business.
I feel it's my duty to help and be an example to everyone that has gone through hard time. I believe that its important to be there for other and that is why I work so hard to make people smile. Every person that comes in our door is family and I let them know just how much I appreciate them with a wonderful home cooked meal and a smile. I never would of thought that I would be here and I am very greatful for my blessing. I just want to keep it going.
lender.occupational_info: I get up every morning and go out shopping for what I will need for the day. I have over 12 dinner combination, sandwiches, sides and desserts you name it we have it. .I do the cooking, cleaning and everything that it takes to run a restaurant.

lender.name: rickeyda
lender.occupational_info: I am a in home daycare provider, who absoluetly loves kids. I have four of my own. I was a registered family daycare provider for 5yrs until i decided to return to work after my now 8 year old daughter started kindergarten. now i am in the process of restarting my business. although i am having a issue with my inspection passing I am very determined to have my facility open. that is why im in need of a loan to help with repairs to my home.

lender.name: jeff
lender.occupational_info: I drove a concrete mixer for many years untill the U.S.A. economy went bad, now I have to restart my working life all over so I think I can help other poor people by opening up a food trailor to feed the hungry. thank you.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.occupation: Special Education Admin. / Special Ed. Teacher

lender.name: Tavarus
lender.occupational_info: We are a mold prevention and mold restoration co. Our goal is to make sure that every homeowner and there families are safe when entering a structure or home or business

lender.name: Brandi
lender.loan_because: Giving is a wonderful way for me to be of service to others. We are all one and when we give to others we give to ourselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people who repair computers for our customers.

lender.name: DrMSW
lender.loan_because: "Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter." MLK

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I want to help build the US economy by lending money to small business owners.

lender.name: Jodi
lender.occupational_info:
My name is Jodi Newberry. I am a 30 years old and am trying to live my dream of opening up a high end Maternity Consignment Boutique. This boutique will not only carry maternity apparel and accessories but also baby apparel and accessories from newborn up to 5T. I will also carry furniture, designer diaper bags, and so much more. In the future once my store is together. I want to have crafty moms bring in items to sell at retail price - dresses, hair bows, diaper bags, bottle holders, etc (I will rent out the space and make a profit off of each item)
I am also a big supporter of March of Dimes. In the past I made bears with a special saying on it and took them to Doctor's offices and Hospitals for mom's of a loss or premature birth. I did this out of my own pocket but now would like to sell them and all proceeds will go to the March of Dimes.
I believe my store will be a SUCCESS!

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I like to improve the quality of life for all that are giving back to there community.
lender.occupational_info: The N.C. Warrant Enforcement Agency, LLC missions are to improve the quality of life by reducing crime and enhancing public safety.

lender.name: Twanda
lender.loan_because: It helps me to undestand what God has said , that i am a lender and not a borrower. Plus it makes my heart feels great to know i helped someone get started on the road to self- sufficientcy
lender.occupational_info: My partner and I make lingerie for the plus size woman. It's hard for woman of the plus size to find nice gowns and sleepware at a reasonable price

lender.name: Connie
lender.loan_because: I believe in the incredible work that Kiva is doing in helping people to improve their lives with their own hard work and a small loan to get them started.
lender.occupational_info: I negotiate supplier contracts for an information services company

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Ruby
lender.loan_because: Me and husband our starting a small business a hand wash car wash we recently apply for a small loan but we was turn down. We need small loan to purchase some equipment to be in with EPA regulations for waste runoff. We would like to request a loan in our line of credit, which is currently limited to $3,500.00. Our business needs to grow, and we need to purchase equipment. An increase in our credit limit to $3,500.00 will enable us to complete this planned expansion.
lender.occupational_info: CAR WASH by HAND

lender.name: CLAUDY LEOGENE
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in so many ways and i want to help others. I have a wonderful life because someone help me through to get to where i am at right now, it's only right to do the same.

lender.name: Alice
lender.loan_because: I want all the women in the world to be empowered by success that allows them to support their families!
lender.occupational_info: I am 72 years old and retired.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.occupational_info: I place people in jobs for the Medical, Engineering,Hospitality, Accounting industries on temporary or permanent basis.

lender.name: linda
lender.occupation: licensed esthetician and licensed nail technician
lender.loan_because: i have a treatment room in my home for waxing, facials, microcurrent facelift, body wraps, manicures, pedicures, etc. I charge half the prices of the commerical day spas because since i don't have commercial rent i can help people get beauty services at reasonable prices. the economy is bad and people really have to watch their budgets. i like helping people. i need oxygen facial machinery, a microdermabrasion machine, and i want to expand into our garage so that i have more room. i'm a bit cramped in my 18x14 room.
lender.occupational_info: skin care and nail care in georgia usa.

lender.name: Lori
lender.occupational_info: I hand dye human hair extensions process them so they dye will stay in longer and them sew a clip onto them. My business is called Scene Stop. I started my business in June 2008 and have been working really hard to give Scene Stop a good name. I sell my extensions on www.scenestop.net and myworld.ebay.com/scenestop . I also have a variety of extensions at a local store called Culture Shock. I am hoping to grow my business a lot further.

lender.name: Christi
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people become successful in business. I am a business owner myself, and I know how hard it can be to start up a good business, and keep it running.
lender.occupational_info: I own a home and office cleaning service.

lender.name: CMor
lender.loan_because: I am blessed!
lender.occupational_info: Helping people

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.occupational_info: I recently opened a Performance Store for my husband. When he was in Iraq I started a little website to help us with our bills. Since we both love racing and he enjoy fixing cars, I thought it would be a great Idea to start an online business so I could stay home with the family. When he arrived we had an opertunity to share a store with someone. With the way the economy is going we can't afford to rent a whole store. Our dream is to have a store and installation bay. We opened the store with $500 dollars in our pockets and we have so far used all of our savings and used up our credit card.

lender.name: Liz
lender.occupational_info: I am a course designer and teach for the educational technology program at our university.

lender.name: benita
lender.occupational_info: Hello my name is benita and I make close for all ages. Irun my buissness by my self and I give interns a chance to learn more about sewing and comiunicationskills in the buissnessworld. Now I'm running very low on all my supplies and need help in keeping my buissness going stronger as ever Icant get a buisnessloan becouse of my pastcreditstatus please help my buisness Thanks Benita Ps(please email me for any other questions u mide have about this buissness)

lender.name: Franklin
lender.loan_because: I want to loan to help some one get started and get paid back when they are able
lender.occupational_info: I am achaplain at a hospital. i come across lot of little people who are out of work. i help them small amounts of money . Now I came across a person who was a certified mechanic had a stroke recently. I am trying to help him to start his own business. He needs 700 dollars to rent aspace for garage. I have 200. dollars i need 500 dollars. he will return the money in 2 months with interest if you want.

lender.name: Martee
lender.loan_because: I am interested in helping other women realize their goals and dreams...

lender.name: Traci
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I want to help others in my same situation (on SSD) I want to teach internet marketing and do it for free. I want to get my business started to help kids in the neighborhood work part time doing what they love to do best and keep them off the streets.
lender.occupational_info: Its very time consuming and internet based. I am a marketing specialist and offer a very useful service to other small companies to find anyone or do back round checks and run affiliate programs, I offer free websites up and running. I teach others now to affiliatize, monetize, and advertise in many ways. Earning for every site on my search engine and teaching others to do similar internet marketing.

lender.loan_because: I am not here to change the world, but spark the person that will.

lender.name: T. Lewis
lender.loan_because: I've been in need before and couldn't get help and out of the blue someone helped. I want to be that person.
lender.occupational_info: Online marketer working on the Internet and as a Boiled P-Nut Street vendor selling on the streets of Jackson, Mississippi. I am a Bluegrass musician & I Play the 5 String Banjo as my primary instrument & I also sing.
